description:
Natsumi`s stuck at the store and needs an umbrella to get home.  Keroro and Giroro fight for the right to do it!  Then Keroro orders a drink (it`s not alcoholic, really!) that makes the platoon act like a bunch of drunken idiots for New Year`s Eve.  But it has a funny twist.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro VS Giroro, Duel in the Cold Rain / Keroro Platoon, Big Year-End Party
ケロロVSギロロ 氷雨の中の決闘! であります / ケロロ小隊 大忘年会 であります
